H0.text: Erosion is the natural process that farming practices leave some soil exposed and vulnerable to.

H1.text: Migration is the natural process to which farming practices leave some soil exposed and vulnerable.

H2.text: Rust is the natural process that farming practices leave some soil exposed and vulnerable to.

H3.text: Sediment is the natural process that farming practices leave some soil exposed and vulnerable to.

A4.text: Unsustainable agricultural practices increase rates of erosion by one to two orders of magnitude over the natural rate and far exceed replacement by soil production.

A5.text: Human activities have increased by 10â€“50 times the rate at which erosion is occurring world-wide.
